intro: Astronia formusana, commonly known as the slender astronia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, opposite leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale yellow, with five petals and a prominent tube. Astronia formusana is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its delicate appearance and ability to thrive in shaded environments.
